00012   IntersectionHistory::IntersectionHistory(Intersection* i, int* ct,int max, int m_a_i) 
00013     : intersection(i), current_time(ct),  max_history(max), max_throughput(0.0) {
00014 
00015     for(PhaseSet::iterator p=i->phases.begin(); p!=i->phases.end(); p++)
00016       addPhaseHistory(new PhaseHistory(*p,current_time,max));
00017 
00018     for(DetectorSet::iterator d=i->detectors.begin(); d!=i->detectors.end(); d++)
00019       addDetectorHistory(new DetectorHistory(*d,current_time,max,m_a_i));
00020 
00021   }

00026   void IntersectionHistory::setInitialState(){
00027     for(DetectorHistorySet::iterator dt = detectors_history.begin(); dt != detectors_history.end(); dt++)
00028       (*dt)->setInitialState();
00029     for(PhaseHistorySet::iterator p = phases_history.begin(); p != phases_history.end(); p++)
00030       (*p)->setInitialState();
00031   }

00049   /* 
00050    * Get the active phase in a given time.
00051    */
00052   Phase* IntersectionHistory::getPhase(int time){
00053     Phase* p = NULL;
00054     for(PhaseHistorySet::iterator ph = phases_history.begin(); ph != phases_history.end(); ph++){
00055       if( (*ph)->wasActive(time) ) p = (*ph)->getPhase();
00056     }
00057     return p;
00058   }

00063   int IntersectionHistory::getCurrentPhaseDuration(){
00064     PhaseHistory* ph = getPhaseHistory(getCurrentPhase());
00065     return *current_time - ph->lastActivation();
00066   }

00075   double IntersectionHistory::getPhaseMaxDetectorThroughputBetween(Phase* p, int start, int end){
00076     PhaseHistory* ph = getPhaseHistory(p);
00077     // Getting the intervals of activation
00078     vector <int> intervals = ph->getActivationsIntervals(start,end);
00079     int max_total = 0;
00080     int size = intervals.size();
00081     // Finding the maximum count of cars
00082     for(DetectorSet::iterator di = p->detectors.begin(); di != p->detectors.end(); di++){
00083       int total = 0;
00084       DetectorHistory* dh = getDetectorHistory(*di);
00085       for(int i=1;i < size; i+=2){
00086         total += dh->totalDeactivations((double)intervals[i-1],(double)intervals[i]);
00087       }
00088       if( max_total < total ) max_total = total;
00089     }
00090     int total_active_time = ph->totalActiveTime(start,end);
00091     // calculating the rate
00092     double throughput = (total_active_time == 0) ? 0.0 : (double)max_total / (double) total_active_time;
00093     
00094     return throughput;
00095     
00096   }
00097

00105   double IntersectionHistory::getPhaseThroughputBetween(Phase* p, int start, int end){
00106     PhaseHistory* ph = getPhaseHistory(p);
00107     // Getting the intervals of activation
00108     vector <int> intervals = ph->getActivationsIntervals(start,end);
00109     int total = 0;
00110     // Sum the total of cars that passed in every detector
00111     int size = intervals.size();
00112 
00113     for(DetectorSet::iterator di = p->detectors.begin(); di != p->detectors.end(); di++){
00114       DetectorHistory* dh = getDetectorHistory(*di);    
00115       for(int i=1;i < size; i+=2)
00116         total += dh->totalDeactivations((double)intervals[i-1],(double)intervals[i]);
00117     }
00118     int total_active_time = ph->totalActiveTime(start,end);
00119     // calculating the rate
00120     double throughput = (total_active_time == 0) ? 0.0 : (double)total / (double) total_active_time;
00121     // refreshing maximum throughput
00122     if(max_throughput < throughput)
00123       max_throughput = throughput;
00124     
00125     return throughput;
00126     
00127   }

00132   double IntersectionHistory::getMaxThroughput(){
00133     return max_throughput;
00134   }

00139   void IntersectionHistory::addDetectorHistory(DetectorHistory* dh){

00146   void IntersectionHistory::addPhaseHistory(PhaseHistory* ph){
00147     phases_history.push_back(ph);

00155   DetectorHistory* IntersectionHistory::getDetectorHistory(Detector* d){    
00156     for(DetectorHistorySet::iterator dt = detectors_history.begin(); dt != detectors_history.end(); dt++)
00157       if( (*dt)->getDetector() == d) return *dt;
00158     return NULL;
00159     
00160   }
00161 
00166   PhaseHistory* IntersectionHistory::getPhaseHistory(Phase* pe){
00167     for(PhaseHistorySet::iterator p = phases_history.begin(); p != phases_history.end(); p++)
00168       if( (*p)->getPhase() == pe) return *p;
00169     return NULL;
00170   }
